name: abr-u-intellisense
description: Intelligent autocomplete and hover documentation for ABR-U CSS utility classes. Select multiple classes to preview combined CSS!

enumDescriptions: Show hover tooltips when hovering over any ABR-U class
Show hover tooltips only when text is selected (less disruptive)
abr-u-intellisense.hoverMode.description: Controls when ABR-U hover tooltips appear

scripts.build: npm run generate && npm run compile
scripts.publish:openvsx: pwsh -Command "$token = Get-Content secrets/ovsx_pat.txt -Raw; $token = $token.Trim(); npx --yes ovsx publish abr-u-intellisense-$(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\").vsix -p $token"
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:vscode && npm run publish:openvsx
